persistentCharacters.name: Perfect Soul
persistentCharacters.notes:
You can replace characters' portraits by dragging-and-dropping images from the web.
Try it with the pics in the top-right corner!
(Unless you're on a touch device ;_;)

persistentCharacters.name: Volfer
persistentCharacters.notes: Use the Notes fields to write down characters' health, attacks, defenses, etc.

persistentCharacters.name: Novia Claro
persistentCharacters.notes: Press [Save] at the top so your browser will remember everything for next time.

persistentCharacters.name: Iselsi Shen
persistentCharacters.notes: Press [Join Battle] to track characters' initiative and turn status. Changes and notes you make in battle are temporary, and will be reset after the battle ends.
